message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $2000000 is out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits. Let me know if this is more in line with your budget.
I'm still interested in the product, but $1800000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for it. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. However, I still believe the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1600000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1400000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $1550000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $1550000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1350000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to lose patience, Bob. I've already made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $1500000. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but if you're not willing to meet me at this point, I'll have to consider other options. This is my final offer.
I understand you're willing to meet me at $1500000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. This is my final offer.
